3.title: How to Find the Perfect Phone for You in 2023: A Personalized Guide
3.author: Brian Mulwa
3.summary: More often than not, I get questions about getting a new phone. Some are pretty basic like what brand does what, while others borderline extensive research. In this guide, I'm just going ramble on and on about phones and what you need to consider hoping that it helps someone.

4.title: News: The Ins and Outs.
4.author: Brian Mulwa
4.summary: A deep dive on how the news UI is built and how the different articles are fetched and rendered.

5.title: Tiktok: My take!
5.author: Brian Mulwa
5.summary: Telling people to keep off Tiktok feels like advising friends to eat their vegetables - some will do it, some will not, others will try, without consistency. So, I'm going to try my best to tell you about these so called 'vegetables'. You decide what to do.

6.title: Pictures for you to look at!
6.author: Brian Mulwa
6.summary: I'm thinking, how do I tell this story, in a 'me' way? I have not thought hard about this, it just came up. I read that Ruth B., when she was writing Dandelions, was taught to pick a word, and then write a song surrounding that word. I do not remember details like who taught her and all that, but what stuck with me - just like it did for her - is; 'Pick a word, then develop a story around it.'

7.title: Immaterial!
7.author: Brian Mulwa
7.summary: To live, is to experience everything around you!
